de.eckhartarnold.client

Class Presentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.eckhartarnold.client.Presentation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GalleryPresentation, SlideshowPresentation

    public abstract class Presentation
extends java.lang.Object
    Common root of the presentation classes. A presentation manages the slideshow's layout, but it may also manage alternative objects that are displayed while the slideshow is not visible, like, for example, a gallery of images.
    Author:
    eckhart

    • Constructor Detail

      • Presentation

        Presentation(Panel parent,
            Layout layout)
        Constructor of class Presentation. Prepares everything for the presentation, but does not activate the add the layout to the parent panel or activate the slideshow.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent panel
        layout - the layout object.

    • Method Detail

      • parseSlideToken

        static int parseSlideToken(java.lang.String historyToken)
        Parses a Slideshow browser-history token and returns the number of the slide of that token.
        Parameters:
        historyToken - the history token
        Returns:
        slide number or -1, if the history token was not a Slideshow token

      • onResize

        public void onResize(ResizeEvent event)

      • onValueChange

        public void onValueChange( event)

      • setMobileLayout

        public void setMobileLayout(Layout mobileLayout)
        Sets a mobile layout that will be activated automatically on small screens like those on mobile devices. The mobile layout should best be a full screen layout with overlay control panel and no filmstrip.
        Parameters:
        mobileLayout - the layout to be used for mobile devices.

      • activateSlideshow

        protected void activateSlideshow()
        Activates the slideshow and adds the layout to the parent panal.

      • deactivateSlideshow

        protected void deactivateSlideshow()
        Deactivates the slideshow and removes the layout from the parent panel.
